name: small-blind
description: Obligatory first bet. Normally is half than entry price

name: big-blind
description: Obligatory second bet. Normally double than small blind

name: lower
description: Player either hasn't bet yet or his last bet is lower than current bet

name: even
description: Player's last bet has tied the current bet

name: all-in
description: Player has betted all his founds an cannot raise the bet

name: folded
description: Player has folded and retired for current round
